During the coming war, your Clan must ally with one of the following five most vicious types of wild beasts: [npc_%objectId%_Link residence2/clanhall/farm_kel_mahum_messenger_11.htm|Frenzied Cougar] [npc_%objectId%_Link residence2/clanhall/farm_kel_mahum_messenger_12.htm|Frenzied Buffalo] [npc_%objectId%_Link residence2/clanhall/farm_kel_mahum_messenger_13.htm|Frenzied Kookaburra] [npc_%objectId%_Link residence2/clanhall/farm_kel_mahum_messenger_14.htm|Frenzied Baby Buffalo] [npc_%objectId%_Link residence2/clanhall/farm_kel_mahum_messenger_15.htm|Frenzied Baby Cougar]
